articles.title: Putin announces deal to deploy nuclear weapons in Belarus - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Russian president says deal struck with Belarusian counterpart would not violate nuclear nonproliferation agreements.
articles.content:
Russia has struck a deal with neighbouring Belarus to station tactical nuclear weapons on its territory, President Vladimir Putin says.
Putin made the announcement on Saturday as tensions grow with … [+2755 chars]
